title: Gurren Lagann [1080p][Hi10p][Dual-Audio]
description:
Moved to AAC audio. Did some searching and it has better compression than AC3. I set it up to have the same or better quality as before, just smaller size.

Episodes get bigger as the series goes due to the introduction of fine grain and increased action in the episodes. I used the same constant quality setting for all episodes.
